entries: Your study of high elven lore has unlocked fey power that few other elves possess, except your eladrin cousins. Drawing on your fey ancestry, you can momentarily stride through the Feywild to shorten your path from one place to another. You gain the following benefits:

items: You learn to speak, read, and write Sylvan. If you already know the language, you may learn a different one instead.

You learn the {@spell misty step|phb} spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot or its verbal component. You regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a short or long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.
